note: This is statically served and visible publicly.

items.title: 7 Must Have Tools For Web Designers
items.subtitle: Introducing Evelin. Creative UI Kit template for Webflow
items.paragraph_1: The rich text element allows you to create and format headings, paragraphs, block-quotes, images, and video all in one place instead of having to add and format them individually. Just double-click and easily create content.
items.paragraph_2: For dynamic content, add a rich text field to any collection and then connect a rich text element to that field in the settings panel. Headings, paragraphs, block-quotes, figures, images, and figure captions can all be styled.
